platform_id: Unique identify to platform metadata between sheets. can simply be molecular_charaterisation_type + a numerical identifier. No identifyer is needed if unique
molecular_methods_description: Description of the methods and protocols used to generate the molecular data associated with the platform key. This could be a description of the sequencing experiment used to get the cna, mutation or expression data. Also this could be a description of the
analysis_description: Description of the analysis of the molecular data provided

molecular_methods_description: Free Text in paragraph form. Basic markdown is supported for links, bolding, and bullet points
analysis_description: Free Text in paragraph form. Basic markdown is supported for links, bolding, and bullet points
